jcurses.event
Class ListenerManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jcurses.event.ListenerManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionListenerManager, ItemListenerManager, ValueChangedListenerManager, WindowListenerManager
public abstract class ListenerManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the basic class for listener manager. Listener manager are used in widgets classes to manage listeners on widgets's events. This can be also implemented without an listener manager, but these make it easier.

Constructor Detail

ListenerManager

public ListenerManager()
Method Detail

addListener

public void addListener(java.lang.Object listener)
The method adds a listener to the list of managed listeners.
Parameters:
listener - The listener to be added. The listener must be of right type for listened events.

removeListener

public void removeListener(java.lang.Object listener)
The method removes a listener from the list of managed listeners.
Parameters:
listener - The listener to be removed from the list.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Event event)
The method handles an occured event. This method is called in a widget if an event is occured and has to be delegated to listeners.
Parameters:
event - event to be handled

doHandleEvent

protected abstract void doHandleEvent(Event event,
                                      java.lang.Object listener)
The method is called by handleElent for each registered listener. In order this method has to call an method of the listener object with handled event as parameter
Parameters:
event - event to be handled
listener - listener to handle

verifyListener

protected abstract void verifyListener(java.lang.Object listener)
The method verifies an listener object to be of the right type for this listener manager
Parameters:
listener - listener to be verified

verifyEvent

protected abstract void verifyEvent(Event event)
The method verifies an event object to be of the right type for this listener manager
Parameters:
event - event to be verified

countListeners

public int countListeners()
The method returns the number of listeners registered by this listener manager
Returns:
number of registered listeners
